description.value:
You can push larger foes around with your attack. You can use @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Aggressive Block]{Aggressive Block} or @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Brutish Shove]{Brutish Shove} against a creature up to two sizes larger than you.

When a creature you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Shove]{Shove} has to stop moving because it would hit an object, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier (minimum 1). This happens regardless of how you Shoved the creature.
